Universal Law.quote: "Dharma sustains the world order and moral law of the universe." (Rig Veda 1.164.50)

Eternal Law.quote: "The law of the Lord is perfect, refreshing the soul." (Psalm 19:7)

Natural Law.quote: "Heaven and Earth and all things follow Tao. Tao follows what is natural." (Tao Te Ching 25)

Divine Command.quote: "This is My commandment, that you love one another as I have loved you." (John 15:12)

Sacred Law.quote: "We have revealed to you the Book in truth, confirming what came before it of the Scripture." (Quran 5:48)

Moral Law.quote: "The moral law is written in their hearts, their consciences bearing witness." (Romans 2:15)

Cosmic Law.quote: "Rita (cosmic order) is the foundation of all existence." (Atharva Veda 4.1.3)

Divine Justice.quote: "Righteousness and justice are the foundation of Your throne." (Psalm 89:14)

Divine Ordinance.quote: "Follow the way of Dharma as laid down in the scriptures." (Bhagavad Gita 16:24)

Divine Precepts.quote: "Your precepts are my delight, they are my counselors." (Psalm 119:24)

Divine Covenant.quote: "I will put my law within them, and I will write it on their hearts." (Jeremiah 31:33)

Divine Guidance.quote: "This is the path of Allah. Let him who will, take the right path to his Lord." (Quran 76:29)

Divine Authority.quote: "All authority in heaven and on earth has been given to Me." (Matthew 28:18)

Divine Order.quote: "God is not a God of disorder but of peace." (1 Corinthians 14:33)

Divine Wisdom.quote: "The law of the wise is a fountain of life." (Proverbs 13:14)

Sacred Rules.quote: "These are the laws, regulations and instructions." (Leviticus 26:46)

Divine Decree.quote: "What Allah has decreed must come to pass." (Quran 33:38)

Divine Statutes.quote: "Blessed are those who keep His statutes and seek Him with all their heart." (Psalm 119:2)

Divine Ethics.quote: "Practice righteousness, speak the truth, do not harm any living being." (Buddha, Dhammapada)

Holy Commandments.quote: "If you love Me, keep My commandments." (John 14:15)

Divine Principles.quote: "The Tao principle is what happens of itself." (Tao Te Ching 51)

Sacred Duties.quote: "Better is one's own dharma though imperfect, than another's dharma well-performed." (Bhagavad Gita 3:35)

Divine Judgment.quote: "The judgments of the Lord are true and righteous altogether." (Psalm 19:9)

Divine Constitution.quote: "The constitution of the universe is hidden in the Vedas." (Upanishads)

Divine Governance.quote: "The kingdom of God does not come with observation." (Luke 17:20)

Sacred Obligations.quote: "Fulfill your covenant with Me, I shall fulfill My covenant with you." (Quran 2:40)

Divine Discipline.quote: "For whom the Lord loves He disciplines." (Hebrews 12:6)

Divine Standards.quote: "Be holy, for I am holy." (1 Peter 1:16)

Divine Path.quote: "This is the way, walk in it." (Isaiah 30:21)

Divine Regulations.quote: "These are the regulations, laws and decrees." (Deuteronomy 6:1)
